data.text: Ho Ho Ho Ho!
data.name: Santa Claus
data.processed: <story>Ho Ho Ho Ho!

data.text: Merry Christmas, Oguri Cap!
data.name: Santa Claus
data.processed: <story>Merry Christmas, Oguri Cap!

data.text:
Santa-san! Nice to meet you. 
It's already that time of the year, huh?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Santa-san! Nice to meet you. 
<story>It's already that time of the year, huh?

data.text: I have a message and a present to give to you.
data.name: Santa Claus
data.processed: <story>I have a message and a present to give to you.

data.text:
Now then, have a wonderful Christmas! 
Ho Ho Ho!
data.name: Santa Claus
data.processed:
<story>Now then, have a wonderful Christmas! 
<story>Ho Ho Ho!

data.text:
Woah, thank you…! Your job must be difficult, 
but know that I'm always cheering you on! Now then…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Woah, thank you…! Your job must be difficult, 
<story>but know that I'm always cheering you on! Now then…

data.text:
"To Oguri Cap-sama. Here is an invitation 
to a Christmas party. From your fans."
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>"To Oguri Cap-sama. Here is an invitation 
<story>to a Christmas party. From your fans."

data.text: Christmas party!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>Christmas party!

data.text:
That has a nice ring to it! And what was my present…? 
Hmm… Was this from the URA?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>That has a nice ring to it! And what was my present…? 
<story>Hmm… Was this from the URA?

data.text: …! This is!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>…! This is!

data.text:
"With permission from the academy, us fans have prepared a 
variety of entertainment and food in order to wish you the best 
of luck in your future endeavors."
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>"With permission from the academy, us fans have prepared a 
<story>variety of entertainment and food in order to wish you the best 
<story>of luck in your future endeavors."

data.text:
Food…! "We hope that this party will help you recuperate 
before your next race. If you are able to make it, we would love 
it if you would also wear your racing outfit to the party."
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Food…! "We hope that this party will help you recuperate 
<story>before your next race. If you are able to make it, we would love 
<story>it if you would also wear your racing outfit to the party."

data.text:
"We are looking forward to seeing you at the party." 
I'm looking forward to this too…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>"We are looking forward to seeing you at the party." 
<story>I'm looking forward to this too…

data.text:
So you will be attending a party 
held by your fans, is that correct?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>So you will be attending a party 
<story>held by your fans, is that correct?

data.text:
Hayahide… Eh? 
How did you know?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Hayahide… Eh? 
<story>How did you know?

data.text: You were reading aloud, you know.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>You were reading aloud, you know.

data.text:
But something seemed to be bothering you regarding their request 
for you to wear your racing outfit… Is something the matter?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>But something seemed to be bothering you regarding their request 
<story>for you to wear your racing outfit… Is something the matter?

data.text:
Actually, the URA said that they wanted to make me a new racing 
outfit in honor of my past achievements.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Actually, the URA said that they wanted to make me a new racing 
<story>outfit in honor of my past achievements.

data.text: So I've heard. Congratulations.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>So I've heard. Congratulations.

data.text:
Thank you. But the thing is that I couldn't decide on a 
design… So one of the staff members came up to me and told me 
about a project that they had been working on.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Thank you. But the thing is that I couldn't decide on a 
<story>design… So one of the staff members came up to me and told me 
<story>about a project that they had been working on.

data.text:
This project had fans send in their racing outfit designs for 
their favorite Uma Musume. They said that they received a lot of 
submissions with me as the model.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>This project had fans send in their racing outfit designs for 
<story>their favorite Uma Musume. They said that they received a lot of 
<story>submissions with me as the model.

data.text:
When they showed the outfits to me, they all looked so cool… So 
I asked if I could use one as the design for my new outfit.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>When they showed the outfits to me, they all looked so cool… So 
<story>I asked if I could use one as the design for my new outfit.

data.text:
I see. Going to a party hosted by your fans while wearing a 
racing outfit filled with the love and affection of said fans… 
That's wonderful, is it not?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>I see. Going to a party hosted by your fans while wearing a 
<story>racing outfit filled with the love and affection of said fans… 
<story>That's wonderful, is it not?

data.text:
Well, I'm truly grateful… 
Grateful, but…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Well, I'm truly grateful… 
<story>Grateful, but…

data.text:
I've been feeling off lately. 
I haven't been doing well in races either.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>I've been feeling off lately. 
<story>I haven't been doing well in races either.

data.text:
When it came to the big stage, 
I failed to meet everyone's expectations. 
I let down everyone that believed in me…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>When it came to the big stage, 
<story>I failed to meet everyone's expectations. 
<story>I let down everyone that believed in me…

data.text:
Despite that, they still decided to throw a party so that I could 
"shine once again in my races" and thought of new racing outfit 
designs for someone like me. That's… How do I put it…?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Despite that, they still decided to throw a party so that I could 
<story>"shine once again in my races" and thought of new racing outfit 
<story>designs for someone like me. That's… How do I put it…?

data.text:
To put it simply, you're excited for the party and grateful for 
the designs, but at the same time you're feeling a bit guilty 
because they continue to encourage you…?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>To put it simply, you're excited for the party and grateful for 
<story>the designs, but at the same time you're feeling a bit guilty 
<story>because they continue to encourage you…?

data.text:
Ah, yes, that's it! How did you figure it out? 
You're just like Tama… but without the accent. 
Maybe it's the glasses?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Ah, yes, that's it! How did you figure it out? 
<story>You're just like Tama… but without the accent. 
<story>Maybe it's the glasses?

data.text:
Glasses…? No, it was just an inference. Anyway, there seems to 
be no small number of fans supporting and encouraging you.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Glasses…? No, it was just an inference. Anyway, there seems to 
<story>be no small number of fans supporting and encouraging you.

data.text:
Furthermore, they all seem enamored with you, Oguri-san. They 
simply wanted to "encourage" you with this party.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Furthermore, they all seem enamored with you, Oguri-san. They 
<story>simply wanted to "encourage" you with this party.

data.text:
Why don't you forget about racing for a while and enjoy yourself? 
It would be a great way to repay their kindness. Anyway, I hope 
you have a wonderful holiday.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Why don't you forget about racing for a while and enjoy yourself? 
<story>It would be a great way to repay their kindness. Anyway, I hope 
<story>you have a wonderful holiday.

data.text:
Thank you, 
I hope you have a wonderful holiday too! 
"Repay their kindness…"
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Thank you, 
<story>I hope you have a wonderful holiday too! 
<story>"Repay their kindness…"

data.text:
That's right, it's Christmas after all. 
I'd love to give them an amazing present in return as well.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>That's right, it's Christmas after all. 
<story>I'd love to give them an amazing present in return as well.

data.text:
But… what would that be? 
When it comes to Christmas all I can think about is… 
Chicken rice, turkey, stew, fried potatoes, tsukudani​…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>But… what would that be? 
<story>When it comes to Christmas all I can think about is… 
<story>Chicken rice, turkey, stew, fried potatoes, tsukudani​…

data.text:
Salad, pasta, sauté, bao, borscht, the foods with difficult to 
say names, and the foods with fun to say names…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Salad, pasta, sauté, bao, borscht, the foods with difficult to 
<story>say names, and the foods with fun to say names…

data.text:
Ah, It's Oguri-san! 
Everyone, Oguri-san has arrived!
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>Ah, It's Oguri-san! 
<story>Everyone, Oguri-san has arrived!

data.text: (Clap clap clap clap!)
data.processed: <story>(Clap clap clap clap!)

data.text:
Haah!? Th-This is…? 
There's chicken rice here as well as turkey…!?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Haah!? Th-This is…? 
<story>There's chicken rice here as well as turkey…!?

data.text:
We're still in the middle of setting up for the party! 
More importantly, Oguri-san, 
your racing outfit…! It looks amazing on you!
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>We're still in the middle of setting up for the party! 
<story>More importantly, Oguri-san, 
<story>your racing outfit…! It looks amazing on you!

data.text: Sh-She looks so… good…! Sniffle.
data.name: Oguri Cap Fan A
data.processed: <story>Sh-She looks so… good…! Sniffle.

data.text: !? Wh-Why are you crying…?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>!? Wh-Why are you crying…?

data.text:
You see, that design was made by all of us here! 
To see you actually wearing it…
data.name: Oguri Cap Fan A
data.processed:
<story>You see, that design was made by all of us here! 
<story>To see you actually wearing it…

data.text:
So that's why… When I first saw this design it immediately 
jumped out to me. It has to be the emotion you all put into it 
that made me choose it.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>So that's why… When I first saw this design it immediately 
<story>jumped out to me. It has to be the emotion you all put into it 
<story>that made me choose it.

data.text:
Thank you everyone. I'm so grateful for the Christmas 
present that you all made for me…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Thank you everyone. I'm so grateful for the Christmas 
<story>present that you all made for me…

data.text:
Hey, Oguri, we worked really hard too! We made the star for the 
tree outside! It's really big, you know!
data.name: Fan's Child A
data.processed:
<story>Hey, Oguri, we worked really hard too! We made the star for the 
<story>tree outside! It's really big, you know!

data.text:
When you say the tree outside… Ah, you mean 
the tree that was bigger than a log house! But 
I don't remember seeing anything on it…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>When you say the tree outside… Ah, you mean 
<story>the tree that was bigger than a log house! But 
<story>I don't remember seeing anything on it…

data.text:
What they made was as big as a real star, so it's being shipped 
separately for safekeeping. It should arrive before the party 
begins, so look forward to it.
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>What they made was as big as a real star, so it's being shipped 
<story>separately for safekeeping. It should arrive before the party 
<story>begins, so look forward to it.

data.text:
I see… Everyone, thank you so much. I'm really looking forward 
to the party, and I am so grateful for you all.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>I see… Everyone, thank you so much. I'm really looking forward 
<story>to the party, and I am so grateful for you all.

data.text: However, I haven't…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>However, I haven't…

data.text:
Do you mind if I step out for a bit…? 
I… really want to see the snow…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Do you mind if I step out for a bit…? 
<story>I… really want to see the snow…

data.text:
We don't mind one bit! Feel free to explore until the party 
begins! I'm sure you'll be fine, but please be careful. The 
weather in the mountains can change in the blink of an eye!
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>We don't mind one bit! Feel free to explore until the party 
<story>begins! I'm sure you'll be fine, but please be careful. The 
<story>weather in the mountains can change in the blink of an eye!

data.text:
I can't leave things as they are… 
I need to find a present for everyone!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>I can't leave things as they are… 
<story>I need to find a present for everyone!

data.text: Oh? Isn't that…
data.processed: <story>Oh? Isn't that…
